entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
